entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • RequestLocalizationMiddleware does not handle CultureInfo.InvariantCulture since version 8 #58843
  • [Identity][UI] Fix asset path for endpoint definitions #58841
  • Routing with common prefix #58838
  • Interactable UI During Exporting in Blazor WebAssembly #58836
  • JwtSecurityTokenHandler.ReadJwtToken is not reading the issuer #58835
  • Not found routes causes Blazor WASM to reload. #58834

Closed

  • Concurrency Issue in OpenApiSchemaStore #58845
  • Quarantine StreamPool_MultipleStreamsConcurrent_StreamsReturnedToPool #39477
    Test failures
  • Embed a Blazor component inside an Angular App needs very long to be rendered #58831
  • .NET 6/7 migration to .NET 8 with Docker container #53327
  • Unhandled error when using Blazor .NET 8 template in Global page mode with FireFox #58824
  • my clients logouts after 30 minutes #58609

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix IIS outofprocess to remove WebSocket compression handshake #58846
    feature-iis, area-networking
  • Handling CultureInfo.InvariantCulture in RequestLocalizationMiddleware #58844
    community-contribution, area-middleware

Merged

  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `1204d63` to `d144031` #58840
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview1

Updated

  • Adds the ability to specify an appsettings file for user-jwts #58605
    area-commandlinetools, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Support returning OpenAPI document in YAML from MapOpenApi #58616
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal
  • Update .NET SDK to 10.0.100-alpha.1.24553.6 #58776
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:
  • Convert ref and runtime packs to use the SharedFramework SDK and Arcade's installer tooling #58612
    blocked, area-infrastructure
  • [release/9.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `6dae7eb` to `1204d63` #58743
    area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun, 9.0.x
  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/MessagePack-CSharp from `9511905` to `9aeb12b` #58744
    area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `6dae7eb` to `1204d63` #58745
    area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun, 6.0.x
  • Correct typo in ProtectedPersonalDataAttribute.cs & PersonalDataAttribute.cs #58664
    area-identity, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Add package for consuming Blazor framework assets #58721
    area-blazor
